content.description: This route starts on a right handed crimp about half way up the rock on the right side of the overhang.  Follow crimps direct up this black streak in the rock.  Its harder than Lefty Direct.  The sit start is a considerably harder project (V4?).
content.protection: Pad/Spotter are nice but not necessary.  Flat landing and easy walk off

content.description: Sit start on the lower right side of the overhang on the rail, walk up the rail and pitch out to a big pocket  on the left about 6 feet up, then follow the crimps/ledges direct to the top.  Good warm-up.  Pictures coming soon.
content.protection: Pad/Spotter is nice, but not necessary.  The landing is very flat and there is an easy ramp to walk off.

content.description: Sit start on the two crimps on the left side of the overhang (they are below and left of the rail).  Pitch up to the big pockett and go direct from there on crimps and shallow ledges/pockets.  Pictures coming soon. (Don't normally rate routes so the rating may be off, its  harder than The Railing).
content.protection: Spotter/Pad are nice but not necessary.  Flat landing and easy walk off
